title: Are we overdue for Project skins?
body:
I really like the Project skin line (and really want Talon to get a project skin), and it seems like we're quite overdue, but I'm not sure.

PROJECT: Ashe was released in 2016, presumably with some other Project skins too, and PROJECT: Vayne, as well as Jhin and Vi were released in late 2017, but throughout the entirety of 2018 there have been no Project skins, so does that mean we can expect a new batch soon?

The reason I'm asking is because I'm not very knowledgeable on that kind of thing and I don't wanna be hyped for nothing.

Thanks!
